verses.verse: Then Moses <WH4872> assembled <WH6950> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and said <WH559> to them, "These <WH428> are the things <WH1697> that the Lord <WH3068> has commanded <WH6680> [you] to do. <WH6213>

"For six <WH8337> days <WH3117> work <WH4399> may be done, <WH6213> but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> you shall have <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> [day,] a sabbath <WH7676> of complete <WH7677> rest <WH7677> to the Lord; <WH3068> whoever <WH3605> does <WH6213> any work <WH4399> on it shall be put <WH4191> to death. <WH4191>
"You shall not kindle <WH1197> a fire <WH784> in any <WH3605> of your dwellings <WH4186> on the sabbath <WH7676> day. <WH3117>"

And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH559> to all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> "This <WH2088> is the thing <WH1697> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> has commanded, <WH6680> saying, <WH559>

'Take <WH3947> from among you a contribution <WH8641> to the Lord; <WH3068> whoever <WH3605> is of a willing <WH5081> heart, <WH3820> let him bring <WH935> it as the Lord's contribution: <WH8641> gold, <WH2091> silver, <WH3701> and bronze, <WH5178>
and blue, <WH8504> purple <WH713> and scarlet <WH8144> [material,] fine <WH8336> linen, <WH8336> goats' [hair,]
and rams' skins <WH5785> dyed <WH119> red, <WH119> and porpoise <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and acacia <WH7848> wood, <WH6086>
and oil <WH8081> for lighting, <WH3974> and spices <WH1314> for the anointing <WH4888> oil, <WH8081> and for the fragrant <WH5561> incense, <WH7004>
and onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68> and setting <WH4394> stones, <WH68> for the ephod <WH646> and for the breastpiece. <WH2833>
'And let every <WH3605> skillful <WH2450> <WH3820> man <WH2450> <WH3820> among you come, <WH935> and make <WH6213> all <WH3605> that the Lord <WH3068> has commanded: <WH6680>
the tabernacle, <WH4908> its tent <WH168> and its covering, <WH4372> its hooks <WH7165> and its boards, <WH7175> its bars, <WH1280> its pillars, <WH5982> and its sockets; <WH134>
the ark <WH727> and its poles, <WH905> the mercy <WH3727> seat, <WH3727> and the curtain <WH6532> of the screen; <WH4539>
the table <WH7979> and its poles, <WH905> and all <WH3605> its utensils, <WH3627> and the bread <WH3899> of the Presence; <WH6440>
the lampstand <WH4501> also for the light <WH3974> and its utensils <WH3627> and its lamps <WH5216> and the oil <WH8081> for the light; <WH3974>

and the altar <WH4196> of incense <WH7004> and its poles, <WH905> and the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> and the fragrant <WH5561> incense, <WH7004> and the screen <WH4539> for the doorway <WH6607> at the entrance <WH6607> of the tabernacle; <WH4908>
the altar <WH4196> of burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> with its bronze <WH5178> grating, <WH4346> its poles, <WH905> and all <WH3605> its utensils, <WH3627> the basin <WH3595> and its stand; <WH3653>
the hangings <WH7050> of the court, <WH2691> its pillars <WH5982> and its sockets, <WH134> and the screen <WH4539> for the gate <WH8179> of the court; <WH2691>
the pegs <WH3489> of the tabernacle <WH4908> and the pegs <WH3489> of the court <WH2691> and their cords; <WH4340>

the woven <WH8278> garments, <WH899> for ministering <WH8334> in the holy <WH6944> place, the holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> and the garments <WH899> of his sons, <WH1121> to minister <WH3547> as priests. <WH3547>' "
Then all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> departed <WH3318> from Moses' presence. <WH6440>

And everyone <WH3605> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> stirred <WH5375> him and everyone <WH3605> whose <WH834> spirit <WH7307> moved <WH5068> him came <WH935> [and] brought <WH935> the Lord's contribution <WH8641> for the work <WH4399> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> and for all <WH3605> its service <WH5656> and for the holy <WH6944> garments. <WH899>

Then all <WH3605> whose hearts <WH3820> moved <WH5081> them, both men <WH376> and women, <WH802> came <WH935> [and] brought <WH935> brooches <WH2397> and earrings <WH5141> and signet <WH2885> rings <WH2885> and bracelets, <WH3558> all <WH3605> articles <WH3627> of gold; <WH2091> so [did] every <WH3605> man <WH376> who <WH834> presented <WH5130> an offering <WH8573> of gold <WH2091> to the Lord. <WH3068>

And every <WH3605> man, <WH376> who <WH834> had <WH4672> in his possession <WH854> blue <WH8504> and purple <WH713> and scarlet <WH8144> [material] and fine <WH8336> linen <WH8336> and goats' [hair] and rams' skins <WH5785> dyed <WH119> red <WH119> and porpoise <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> brought <WH935> them.

Everyone <WH3605> who could make <WH7311> a contribution <WH8641> of silver <WH3701> and bronze <WH5178> brought <WH935> the Lord's contribution; <WH8641> and every <WH3605> man, who <WH834> had <WH4672> in his possession <WH854> acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086> for any <WH3605> work <WH4399> of the service, <WH5656> brought <WH935> it.

And all <WH3605> the skilled <WH2450> <WH3820> women <WH802> spun <WH2901> with their hands, <WH3027> and brought <WH935> what <WH4299> they had spun, <WH4299> [in] blue <WH8504> and purple <WH713> [and] scarlet <WH8144> [material] and [in] fine <WH8336> linen. <WH8336>
And all <WH3605> the women <WH802> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> stirred <WH5375> with a skill <WH2451> spun <WH2901> the goats' [hair.]
And the rulers <WH5387> brought <WH935> the onyx <WH7718> stones <WH68> and the stones <WH68> for setting <WH4394> for the ephod <WH646> and for the breastpiece; <WH2833>
and the spice <WH1314> and the oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974> and for the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> and for the fragrant <WH5561> incense. <WH7004>

The Israelites, <WH3478> <WH1121> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> and women, <WH802> whose <WH834> heart <WH3820> moved <WH5068> them to bring <WH935> [material] for all <WH3605> the work, <WH4399> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> through <WH3027> Moses <WH4872> to be done, <WH6213> brought <WH935> a freewill <WH5071> offering <WH5071> to the Lord. <WH3068>

Then Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> to the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> "See, <WH7200> the Lord <WH3068> has called <WH7121> by name <WH8034> Bezalel <WH1212> the son <WH1121> of Uri, <WH221> the son <WH1121> of Hur, <WH2354> of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah. <WH3063>
"And He has filled <WH4390> him with the Spirit <WH7307> of God, <WH430> in wisdom, <WH2451> in understanding <WH8394> and in knowledge <WH1847> and in all <WH3605> craftsmanship; <WH4399>
to make <WH2803> designs <WH4284> for working <WH6213> in gold <WH2091> and in silver <WH3701> and in bronze, <WH5178>
and in the cutting <WH2799> of stones <WH68> for settings, <WH4390> and in the carving <WH2799> of wood, <WH6086> so as to perform <WH6213> in every <WH3605> inventive <WH4284> work. <WH4399>
"He also has put <WH5414> in his heart <WH3820> to teach, <WH3384> both he and Oholiab, <WH171> the son <WH1121> of Ahisamach, <WH294> of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan. <WH1835>

"He has filled <WH4390> them with skill <WH2451> <WH3820> to perform <WH6213> every <WH3605> work <WH4399> of an engraver <WH2796> and of a designer <WH2803> and of an embroiderer, <WH7551> in blue <WH8504> and in purple <WH713> [and] in scarlet <WH8144> [material,] and in fine <WH8336> linen, <WH8336> and of a weaver, <WH707> as performers <WH6213> of every <WH3605> work <WH4399> and makers <WH2803> of designs. <WH4284>
